item.title: Bangalore to Udupi Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Udupi can be a delightful experience, as you'll get to explore the pristine beaches, ancient temples, and delicious cuisine of this coastal town in Karnataka. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Hassan -> Sakleshpura -> Mangaluru -> Udupi -> Mangaluru -> Sakleshpura -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Udupi Star
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
